data.question: It's time for your annual appraisal with your boss. You:

answers.answer: Look forward to hearing what your boss thinks about you and expects from you
Rehearse ad nauseam the arguments and ideas that you’ve prepared for the meeting
Go along unprepared as you are confident and like improvising

data.question: You can't find your car keys. You:

answers.answer: Don't want anyone to find out, so you take the bus instead
Panic and search madly without asking anyone for help
Grumble without telling your family why you’re in a bad mood

data.question: You can't find your car keys. You:

answers.answer: Don't want anyone to find out, so you take the bus instead
Panic and search madly without asking anyone for help
Accuse those around you for misplacing them

data.question: A friend arrives late for your meeting. You:

answers.answer: Say, 'It's not a problem,’ even if that's not what you really think
Give them a filthy look and sulk for the rest of the evening
Make a scene in front of everyone
